text: "Run to the Hills" is a 1982 song by British heavy metal band Iron Maiden and is the leading single from their third studio album The Number of the Beast. It went to number 3 in the United Kingdom, number 5 in Finland, number 6 in Italy, number 11 in Canada, number 15 in Norway, number 16 in Ireland, number 27 in Australia and number 73 in France. ==Track listing== ;7" single ;1985 7" Live single ;1985 12" Live single ;2002 7" Red Vinyl single ;2002 Enhanced CD Part. I ;2002 Enhanced CD Part. II ;2002 Enhanced CD European Edition == References == Category:1982 songs Category:Iron Maiden songs Category:Heavy metal
title: Run to the Hills
